name: Callum Jervis Prototypes
description:
Speed Racer-  Two player racing game with obstacles and power ups to reach the end of the race area. Player one will use WAD to move right, left and jump while Player two will use arrow keys of left and right while using spacebar to jump. Press P to pause the game. 

Changing season- A endless runner with the power to go through a portal which would change the season of the map. Use A and D to move left or right to dodge obstacles of the map while collecting points to receive a high score. Use spacebar to pause the game. 

Gravity Switch- A point and click puzzle style game with the ability to shift gravity to your will, using orbs placed around the map. you can flip the stage and launch your character to complete the puzzle maps. However due to a unforeseen bug which has happened in Unreal engine this could not be upload to download.
